search.query: | rest /servicesNS/-/cyences_app_for_splunk/saved/searches count=0 splunk_server=local | search "eai:acl.app"="cyences_app_for_splunk" title IN ("Device Inventory - Kaspersky") | table title, disabled | rename title as label | eval status=if(disabled=1, "Report is disabled", "Report is enabled") | table label, status

format.colorPalette: {"Data Present": #008000, "Data Not Present": #B83C08, "Report is enabled": #008000, "Report is disabled": #B83C08}

search.query: | inputlookup cs_kaspersky_inventory | search hostname IN ($tkn_host$) ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | sort + kaspersky_status | fields - hostname, mac_address | `cs_human_readable_time_format(time,last_connected_time)`

`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_ATTACK_DETECTED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | eval AttackName = coalesce(AttackName,EVC_EV_ATTACK_NAME) | table dest application action AttackName Attack* signature TaskName user user_domain url | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_VIRUS_FOUND dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$)| table _time dest VirusName category action VirusName TaskName msg user user_domain | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_VIRUS_FOUND_AND_PASSED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | eval category = coalesce(category,cat) | table _time dest category VirusName TaskName msg user user_domain | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_VIRUS_FOUND_AND_BLOCKED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | eval category = coalesce(category,cat) | table _time dest VirusName category action VirusName TaskName msg user user_domain | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` log_type=GNRL_EV_ANTIVIRAL_BASES_EXPIRED TERM(GNRL_EV_ANTIVIRAL_BASES_EXPIRED) dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$)| table _time dest ProductName ProductVersion msg | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_SUSPICIOUS_OBJECT_FOUND TERM(GNRL_EV_SUSPICIOUS_OBJECT_FOUND) dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | table _time dest ProductName ProductVersion user VirusName TaskName msg | fillnull value="-"
`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_OBJECT_BLOCKED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | table _time dest user category action signature TaskName msg | fillnull value="-"
`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_OBJECT_DELETED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$) | table _time dest user category action signature TaskName msg | fillnull value="-"
`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_OBJECT_NOTCURED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$)| table _time dest user category TaskName msg | fillnull value="-"
`cs_kaspersky` tag=malware tag=attack log_type=GNRL_EV_OBJECT_NOTCURED dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$)| table _time dest user category TaskName msg | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` log_type IN (KLSRV_RUNTIME_ERROR) dest IN ($tkn_host$) dest_ip IN ($tkn_ip$)| dedup msg ProductName ProductVersion | table _time dest ProductName ProductVersion msg | fillnull value="-"

`cs_kaspersky` sourcetype="kaspersky:klsrv" log_type IN (KLSRV_HOST_STATUS_CRITICAL) dest IN ($tkn_host$) | rex field=_raw "EVC_EV_DESC=.*: (?[^.]+)" | rex field=_raw "EVC_EV_DESC=.*device '(?[^']+)'" | rex field=_raw "src=(?\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)" | dedup DeviceName Description | `cs_human_readable_time_format(_time,event_time)` | table event_time Description DeviceName
